entries.name: exec:analyze
entries.intent: Analyze organizational documents to extract executive director responsibilities and automation opportunities

entries.name: exec:customize
entries.intent: Customize automation workflows, scoring weights, and agent behaviors

entries.name: exec:dashboard
entries.intent: Display automation status, metrics, and performance dashboard

entries.name: exec:deploy
entries.intent: Deploy generated LangGraph workflows to execution environment with validation, monitoring, and rollback capabilities

entries.name: exec:export
entries.intent: Export automation configurations, workflows, reports, and data from the exec-automator platform

entries.name: exec:generate
entries.intent: Generate production-ready LangGraph workflow code from scored automation designs

entries.name: exec:integrate
entries.intent: Configure and manage external system integrations (CRM, AMS, Calendar, etc.)

entries.name: exec:map
entries.intent: Map responsibilities to LangGraph workflow nodes, edges, and state - Transform analyzed executive director responsibilities into comprehensive LangGraph workflow architecture with node definitions, state schemas, edge relationships, and human-in-the-loop checkpoints

entries.name: exec:orchestrate
entries.intent: Full pipeline orchestrator for executive director automation - analyze documents, map processes, score automation potential, generate LangGraph workflows, simulate execution, and deploy AI agents

entries.name: exec:report
entries.intent: Generate comprehensive automation analysis and ROI reports with executive summaries, performance metrics, cost savings analysis, and strategic recommendations

entries.name: exec:score
entries.intent: Calculate automation potential scores using 6-factor weighted algorithm

entries.name: exec:simulate
entries.intent: Simulate workflow execution with test data to validate before deployment

entries.name: exec:template
entries.intent: Manage workflow templates and document templates for automation - create, edit, import, export, and apply pre-built templates for common executive tasks
